channel.title: A Batch File Can Be An Exe File?
channel.description: Ok recently people have been saying that batch files cannot be .exe files. WRONG! I have made many batch files and made them into .exe files. I use that for my compiler and runserver and more. The reason why is because some asshole made a bat file and said it did something cool (back when I was a dipshit...LONG TIME AGO) so I put it in my server and nothing happened. So I went to compile my server and it got deleted...So I went to see what was in my compiler.bat and it had all this del *.java shit...So I want to see if you guys think if a batch file can be an executable file.

item.title: A Batch File Can Be An Exe File?
item.dc:creator: @MontyBoy MontyBoy
item.description:
@MontyBoy wrote:

Not that people say ti doesn’t exsist, but rather the fact what kind of a faggot makes it into an .exe.

I’d be pretty suspicous myself if i opened a folder and found one.

item.title: A Batch File Can Be An Exe File?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Call of Duty:

Maybe if you rename the batch file with another batch file, you can do that with png to jag files, not sure if it’s possible though.

Yea there is a program I used it and he is right:[quote=“Noobs44, post:3, topic:186858”]Yes there’s a program called Bat To Exe Converter, you can download it for free.[/quote]

Read full topic
